page.title: 07THE LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content: The policeman who owns the policehouse in Littleton is called{ { .P.C.BIELBY.}His office is attached to the side of his house and his house is owned by the policeforce.If there is someone he has to take to prison he takes them to Winchester Prison.{ {P.C.BIELBY'S}wife is a policewoman and works in Romsey.{P.C.BIELBY}is the only policeman in the Littleton area.It was his own chose to move to Littleton,he came from Portsmouth.The most popular thing he has to deal with is thefts.On his motorbike he keeps First Aid,tape measures and a raincoat.On the back he has a walky talky.In{P.C.BIELBY'S}helmet he has at the side a little speaker where he can hear a voice which comes from North Walls in Winchester.His motorbike is very large and quite wide.
